text: Vjera Petrović-Njegoš, Princess of Montenegro (Cyrillic: Вјера Петровић-Његош; 22 February 1887 – 31 October 1927) was a member of the Petrović-Njegoš dynasty as the eleventh (of twelve) child of Nicholas I of Montenegro and Milena of Montenegro.Family tree She did not marry and did not have children. ==See also== * Petrović-Njegoš family tree ==Notes== ==References== Category:1887 births Category:1927 deaths Category:People from Cetinje Category:Montenegrin princesses Category:Montenegrin women Category:Eastern Orthodox Christians from Montenegro Category:Petrović-Njegoš dynasty Category:Burials at Serbian Orthodox monasteries and churches
title: Princess Vjera of Montenegro
